views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11

When I look up some words in iBooks, my fingers can not touch the top right "Done" button in the dictionary view while iPhone is taking in my left hand. This tweak add a "Pull down release to close" feature to the dictionary view for iBooks/Safari/OtherApps using system dictionary.

No options to configure.

For demo video, please

No screenshots for this item.

change-notes:
- 0.4 hapic feedback
- 0.3 dictionary detail view close support
- 0.2 fix bug(scroll down also close)
- 0.1 initial release
